snippet.title: Warhammer 40.000: Warpforge - Announce trailer
snippet.description:
The Galaxy is merciless. Will you be able to resist the whims of fate? Choose your army and lead the greatest warriors of the 41st millennium in Warhammer 40.000: Warpforge!

Get ready for a genre-defining CCG coming to PC and mobile in 2023. Experience fast, strategic gameplay, innovative game modes, awesome art and a deep love for Warhammer 40,000 showing through in every detail!

Can't wait to see more? Make sure to join the community on Discord and never miss any of the upcoming news and reveals! Be one of the first to join and get an exclusive Discord server role:
https://www.discord.gg/warpforge

Immerse yourself in the vast Warhammer 40,000 universe through single-player campaigns exploring each of the warring factions. Fight in draft and constructed competitive modes, in both regular play and time-limited competitions with unique rules of engagement, or arm yourself with allies and take part in massive alliance wars, which will test the mettle of even the most seasoned veterans.

Prepare to fight your way to the top when Warhammer 40.000: Warpforge releases on PC and mobile in 2023. Check out the Steam page, subscribe to the newsletter and become a part of the community!

Join the community:
Discord ► https://www.discord.gg/warpforge
Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/warpforge40k
Twitter ► https://twitter.com/warpforge40k
Reddit  ► https://www.reddit.com/r/Warpforge40k/

► Learn more: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1985170/Warhammer_40000_Warpforge/
► Subscribe to the newsletter: https://www.warpforge40k.com
